label: The Ghostly Bishop of Fingest
column6: known for his tyrannical behavior and land theft during his lifetime
column7: is said to haunt the village of Fingest
column8: seeking to return the stolen land for peace in death. The ghostly bishop roams the fields
column9: pleading for the land to be restored to its rightful owners
column10: as the villagers and subsequent landholders continue to ignore his restless spirit.

label: The Ghost of Bisham Abbey
column5: The ghost of Lady Hobby haunts Bisham Abbey
column6: unable to find peace after having beaten her son
column8: to death centuries ago for not keeping his schoolwork neat. Her spirit is a curious site
column9: appearing with reversed colors and constantly trying to wash her hands in a basin she can never reach
